content.rendered:
Directed by Gregory Thomas Garcia.

Written by Wally Baram. Gregory Thomas Garcia. Gregory Thomas Garcia. Gregory Thomas Garcia. Gregory Thomas Garcia. Aixsha Hiciano. Bobby Bowman. Bobby Bowman. Gina Gari. Gina Gari. Michael Pennie. Timothy Stack.

Cast Shakira Barrera (Gloria). Phillip Garcia (Rooster). Clare Gillies (Wiggles). James Earl (Melvin). Martha Plimpton (Barb). Kate Walsh (Paula Tackleberry). Chris Bauer (Stan). Camden Garcia (Collin). David Wells (Herb). Susan Ruttan (Lorraine). Andre Jamal Kinney (Brett). Bunny Levine (Natalie). Bridget Gethins (Sylvia). Fred Grandy (Horace Tackleberry). Zach Strum (24-Year-Old Jack). Joey Diaz (Inmate Joey). Brian Bates (Inmate Larry). Myrna Cabello (Lucia). Chandra Michaels (Kelly). Liam Ouweleen (Young Spike). Blaze James Gorman (Young Rooster). Aaron Weber (Chester). Steven Ogg (Spike). Mark Christopher Lawrence (Hank). Kelly Lester (Arlene). Euseph Messiah (Alex). Timothy Stack (George). Mike Rob (Jean Michel). Shay Guthrie (Lindsey). Annabelle Toomey (Chelsea). Beth Johnstone Bush (Blair). Angel Rosario Jr. (Inmate Peter).

Language English.

Producers Jonathan Berry. Bobby Bowman. Drew Bryden. Garret Dillahunt. Gregory Thomas Garcia. Gina Gari. Aaron Greenberg. Henry J. Lange Jr.. Michael Pennie. Michael Rotenberg. Timothy Stack.

Production 3 Arts Entertainment. Amazon Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status On Going (2022–)
